sys_hub_action_type_definition.description:
This action gets user activity from Atlassian Jira issues.

Inputs:

  • jql - the JQL query to retrieve the list of issues Read More
  • fields - a list of fields to return for the issue (comma-separated)
  • expand - include additional information about the issues in the response (comma-separated)

Outputs: array – array of issue objects Read More

Error Messages:

  • Incomplete Structure Exception. Maybe missing credentials.
  • Unknown Error

To use this action, a corresponding Jira connection and credential must be created and associated with the Jira Connection & Credential alias. Learn More

Note: Requires a subscription for production use. Read More
sys_hub_action_type_definition.name: Get Issues

sys_hub_action_type_snapshot.description:
This action gets user activity from Atlassian Jira issues.

Inputs:

  • jql - the JQL query to retrieve the list of issues Read More
  • fields - a list of fields to return for the issue (comma-separated)
  • expand - include additional information about the issues in the response (comma-separated)

Outputs: array – array of issue objects Read More

Error Messages:

  • Incomplete Structure Exception. Maybe missing credentials.
  • Unknown Error

To use this action, a corresponding Jira connection and credential must be created and associated with the Jira Connection & Credential alias. Learn More

Note: Requires a subscription for production use. Read More
